resources.string: This is Marco Polo. You can create a game and ask a friend to join. Your phone will make a sound that is audible to the other player. Try finding your friend by pointing your phone into their direction!
Invite another player to start the game.

Your friend invites you to play a round of Marco Polo with them! The rules are simple: You can hear your friend by pointing your phone in their direction. Try to hide, because as soon as they find you they have won.
Go! Find your friend \n by pointing your phone in their direction.
You should be hiding! \n Your friend is looking for you.
The other player aborted the game.
